alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT DALE...HENRY AND COFFEE COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN ALABAMA...CLAY...RANDOLPH...WESTERN CALHOUN... NORTHERN EARLY AND QUITMAN COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA THROUGH 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 319 PM EDT/219 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Abbeville to 7 miles west of Elba. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Cuthbert, Fort Novosel, Enterprise, Headland, Ozark, Blakely, Midland City, Level Plains, Edison, Newton, Arlington, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, and Lee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
